DOC.brief_summary: The Norwegian Directorate Health recently publish Norwegian food-based dietary guideline ( NFBDG ) 2011 . The target NFBDG general population , main aim guideline promote public health prevent chronic degenerative disease . Reaching healthy population crucial small proportion general population comply current public dietary advice Norway . Thus , objective study investigate whether multi-faceted dietary intervention could increase compliance NFBDG affect biomarkers chronic degenerative disease healthy population .
DOC.brief_title: Compliance Norwegian Food-Based Dietary Guidelines Young Females
DOC.detailed_description: The study conduct part master level course Clinical Nutrition University Oslo . Thus , main objective study teach master student planning , conduct analyse data clinical trial . The student subject study , however participation study voluntary way affect approval course . Since primary objective study teaching , study confirm `` Regional Committees Medical Health Research Ethics '' ( REC ) exempt REC approval .
DOC.criteria: female serious chronic disease require medication pregnancy
